Text: Tien (meaning "Ten" in Dutch), previously known as Talpa, was the name of a commercial television channel in the Netherlands.
Triplets:<Tien
3:
--------------------
Text: Tien (TV channel):  The owner of Tien, Dutch media mogul John de Mol, decided to rebrand the channel as "Talpa", the Latin word for "mole", which is "mol" in Dutch.

Triplets:<Tien
